ticket.title: Remove RAILS_ROOT from action_dispatch's _trace.erb
ticket.original-body:
There is still RAILS_ROOT at _trace erb and it cause this deprecation message:
` DEPRECATION WARNING: RAILS_ROOT is deprecated! Use Rails.root instead.. (called from _render_template_505937522_82016200_0 at actionpack/lib/action_dispatch/middleware/templates/rescues/_trace.erb:10) `
It would be nice if it can be change to Rails.root to remove the warning noise.
